items.text: edged and taken. That's a rather poor shot. Chases a delivery he had no business playing. No effort to get behind the line or move closer to the pitch. Simply stands in the crease and swings big to get a discernible edge to the keeper
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, OUT

dismissal.text: H Masakadza c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mashrafe Mortaza 15 (24b 2x4 0x6) SR: 62.50

items.text: full and flat on middle and leg, pushed down the pitch
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: oh, shot. Leans into a drive and pushes it firmly along the ground to the right of extra cover. Top shot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: shuffles across and lets this length ball go outside off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: fullish length, no turn, left alone
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: pitched up outside off, presses forward and defends
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: comes forward to defend and the ball comes on with the arm to take the inside of the bat
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: short of a length on off, defended
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: fired well away from the batsman and drifts away further as he walks across and lets it be
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, 1 wide

items.text: shuffles across to this length ball and lets it go
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: fullish on off, defended with an open face to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: short of a length, stops on him a little and he chips it in the air as he closes the face a little early. Lands in front of midwicker running in
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: left alone outside off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: fullish length, drifts away further from the fifth-stump channel, left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: dipping yorker on off, squeezed out to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: reaches out for a cover drive and caresses it with a neat swing of the bat. Beats the fielder diving to his right
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: good length, angled across around the fourth or fifth-stump channel, defended
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, defended back
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, defended
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: good length on middle and leg, bunts it out from the crease
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.preText: Dini: "What does the pitch look like ? any turn on offer ? " Nothing too dramatic, but enough to to keep the spinners interested. And the ball's not coming on, so not easy to score runs.
items.text: fullish, tails away from well outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: back of a length, keeps a little low outside off, stays in the crease and knocks it through the covers
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: good ball. Fires it temptingly outside off. Keeps low and tails back in late. Raza shuffles across and shoulders arms
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, gets behind the line solidly and defends this time
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: great seam position. Accurate length ball outside off, bunted back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run
